title: i didnt get the icon.
body: I never received the 10 year anniversary icon that every received, i got the skin. but never got the icon, i wanted to know if i should wait longer?

replies.body: There are a lot of eligible accounts and not everyone will get everything all at the game time.  Stay up to date at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we roll out these gifts.  It will arrive, just have patience!
try play a game, i did that and it came after i played 2 games
